alert.note: Alert for Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:01AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Bristol, Washington, western Newport, Kent, southeastern Providence and Bristol Counties through 600 AM EDT... At 501 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Block Island, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Providence, Warwick, Cranston, East Providence, Coventry, South Kingstown, West Warwick, North Kingstown, Newport, Bristol, Block Island, Portsmouth, Barrington, Middletown, Narragansett, Swansea, Seekonk, East Greenwich, Rehoboth and Warren. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
